MS MCQs

    Synthesize Text Input to Speech

    »

    1. What is an added “feature” of neural voices over standard voices?

      Adds female sounding voices.

      Deep neural networks are used to determine the input language.

      Can utilize intonation in the spoken output.


    2. What additional parameter is required when synthesizing text input to an audio file?

      Language

      An audio configuration parameter

      Service Region


    3. When is it appropriate to use the Long Audio API?

      For supporting long filenames.

      When synthesizing large text files.

      For enhanced processing of neural voices
